mdRecord.dcterms:title: Commisssioners' sale of land, in Albemarle Co: By virtue of decrees of the Circuit Court of Albemarle county, pronounced in the case of Foster vs. Haskins' administrator and others, the undersigned, commissioners, will, at 2 o'clock, P.M., on Monday, the 6th of July, 1874 .. expose to sale, in front of the court-house of Albemarle county, all the real estate whereof Haskins died seized / R.T.W. Duke, Micajah Woods, Commissioners, May 26, 1874
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Duke, R. T. W. (Richard Thomas Walker), 1822-1898
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Three tracts of land, "situated on the road leading from Hillsborough to Batesville, adjoining the lands of Andrew Black, Miles S. Foster, and others."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Haskins family
Real property--Virginia--Albemarle County
